|brand = ASUS |model = Tinker Board |submodelappend = yes |submodel = Edge R |revision = R1.02 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 04/24/2022 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/ASUS_Tinker_Edge_R |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Rockchip;RK3399 Pro; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_cores2 = 4 |cpu1_total_cores = 6 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A72 |cpu1_type2 = ARM |cpu1_type2_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.8 GHz |cpu1spd2 = 1.4 GHz |gpu1chip1 = Mali;-T860 MP4; |gpu1_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |gpu1_type = ARM |gpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |gpu1spd = 800 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = eMMC 5.1 |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;KLMAG1JETD-B041; |flash1size = 16 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = SPI NOR |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Winbond;W25X05CL; |flash2size = 512 KiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = LPDDR4 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 4 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;K4F6E3S4HMMGCJ; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |ram2type = LPDDR3 |ram2type1 = SDRAM |ram2spd = <!-- 3400,3333,3300,3200,3100,3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram2size = 2 GiB |ram2chip = Samsung;K4E6E304EBEGCF; |ram2_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8211F; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 24:4B:FE |oui = 70:66:55
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;4.4.194;Debian 9;
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe, NGFF M.2, USB 3.1 (Gen 1), Micro SD Card slot, Nano SIM Card slot, |exp_sim_num = 1 |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 2 |exp_usb_num = 4 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12-19 |pwr_amp_dc = 3.5-5.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, via GPIO header,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth 5.0, Micro SD Card slot, Nano SIM Card slot, HDMI, AI Accelerator, MIPI DSI, MIPI CSI, MIPI CSI/DSI, GPIO, SPDIF, I2S, I2C, SPI, RTC w/ battery, fan, heatsink |addchip = 8Kbit Serial I2C EEPROM;STMicro;M24C08-W;;1;,,, Power Distribution Switch (USB 3.0);TI;TPS2553;;1;,,, Power Management IC w/ RTC;Rockchip;RK809-3;;1;,,, USB 3.1 Gen 1 Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL3523;;1;,,, High-Side Power Distribution Controller;ANPEC;APL3542;;1;,,, Adjustable Current-Limited Power Distribution Switch;TI;TPS2557;;2;,,, 14A Synchronous Buck Converter w/ Eco-Mode Control;TI;TPS53319;;1;,,, 2A Transient Response Linear Regulator;ANPEC Electronics;APL5337;;1;,,, 40V 78A Single N−Channel Power MOSFET;OnSemi;NTMFS5C460NL;;3;,,, 3A Ultra Low Dropout Linear Regulator;uPI Semi;uP0132Q;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = linaro |defaultpass = linaro |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Android 9, Armbian (unofficial)
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 05/2020 |estprice = 250 |upc = 192876593219 |ean = 4718017593121 |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIA24GHB76593 |asin = B087X3Q8JC |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = AzureWave AW-CB375NF |rad1modif = Mini PCIe (M.2) |rad1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8822CE; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |rad1ac = 867 |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Rockchip]] RK3399 Pro • Dual Core ARM (Cortex-A72) :@1.8GHz and Quad Core ARM (Cortex-A53) @1.4GHz *NPU: [[Rockchip]] (3.0 TOPS); GPU: Mali-T860 MP4 @800MHz :(OpenGL ES3.1, OpenVG1.1, OpenCL, DX11, AFBC) :VPU (with 4K VP9 and 4K 10-bit H265/H264 decoding) *RAM: 4GB Dual Channel SDRAM (LPDDR4) for system :2GB (LPDDR3) SDRAM for NPU *Storage: 16GB (eMMC 5.1), 512KB (SPI NOR) Flash, :TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port *Wi-Fi: Dual-band 802.11ac (Wi-Fi 5) *USB: 3x USB 3.1 Gen1 (Host) ports, :1x USB 3.1 Gen 1 Type-C (DP) port *GPIO: 1x 40-pin headers *Power: 12-19V DC adapter (5.5/2.5 mm)
{{See also|List of Single-board computers}}
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2019/05/31/asus-tinker-edge-r-pico-itx-rk3399pro-soc/ ''ASUS Tinker Edge R Pico-ITX Board'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/latest-tinker-boards-tap-rk3399pro-and-googles-i-mx8m-and-edge-tpu-equipped-coral-som/ ''Latest Tinker boards tap RK3399 Pro'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
